name: snowflake-poc2-core
description: Streamlined Dashboard Factory for Snowflake with Activity Schema v2.0

scripts.start: sf log --action npm.start.begin 2>/dev/null; node src/server.js; code=$?; sf log --action npm.start.end --attrs '{"exit_code":'$code'}' 2>/dev/null; exit $code
scripts.dashboard-server: sf log --action npm.dashboard.begin 2>/dev/null; node src/dashboard-server.js; code=$?; sf log --action npm.dashboard.end --attrs '{"exit_code":'$code'}' 2>/dev/null; exit $code
scripts.setup: sf log --action npm.setup.begin 2>/dev/null; node scripts/setup.js; code=$?; sf log --action npm.setup.end --attrs '{"exit_code":'$code'}' 2>/dev/null; exit $code
scripts.validate: sf log --action npm.validate.begin 2>/dev/null; node scripts/validate.js; code=$?; sf log --action npm.validate.end --attrs '{"exit_code":'$code'}' 2>/dev/null; exit $code
scripts.test: sf log --action npm.test.begin 2>/dev/null; node tests/integration/test-dashboard.js; code=$?; sf log --action npm.test.end --attrs '{"exit_code":'$code'}' 2>/dev/null; exit $code
scripts.codegen: sf log --action npm.codegen.begin 2>/dev/null; node scripts/codegen-schema.js; code=$?; sf log --action npm.codegen.end --attrs '{"exit_code":'$code'}' 2>/dev/null; exit $code
